level.heading: STANDARD CLAUSES, PROVISIONS AND PROCUREMENT MANUAL (ยง 19-4383)

level.text: The CCO shall develop standard provisions and clauses for all Library solicitations and contracts as required by these Regulations. These standard provisions and clauses define the responsibilities and rights of the parties. The CCO shall develop a procurement manual that provides the details and instructions for implementing these Regulations within 120 after promulgation of these Regulations.
